title: OE1 Trolley
description:
An essential modern storage piece, the OE1 Trolley (2020) began with a desire to simplify people’s lives in an inspirational way. It is the work of Kim Colin and Sam Hecht, who designed the entire OE1 Series with a minimalist aesthetic and flexible functionality that bring stillness and utility to the home or office. Organize your work, bills, school supplies, crafts, art projects, and more with the combination of shelves and drawers that works for you. OE1 is designed to work individually, in multiples, and with what you already have. Trolley with file drawer holds letter- and legal-size folders.
  • A minimalist aesthetic and a slim profile for the office or home.
  • Durable steel and sheet metal welded construction.
  • Moves easily to instantly adapt to shifting needs or room arrangements.
  • Works instantly with existing furniture, and you can choose a color that stands out or blends in.
  • Top tray is a convenient catch-all with a rim around the edge to keep small items in place.
Brand
Herman Miller
Collection
OE1 Collection
General Dimensions
  • 22" H 20" W 11" D
Assembly
Requires Assembly
Warranty
12-year warranty
Terms and conditions apply. Learn more

title: Formwork Box
description:
Design as a means of simplifying people’s lives, the Formwork Collection (2013) is a modular stacking system that brings order to the things that populate our desks. The shapes and sizes of the components were carefully considered so that each contributes to the utility of the whole. The result is a sleek system that brings rhythm and order to everyday tasks. Made in China.
  • Removable cup and lid.
  • Multi-use.
  • Nonslip silicone base.
Brand
Herman Miller
Collection
Formwork Collection
General Dimensions
  • 3⅝" H 9½" W 6⅜" D
Assembly
Comes fully assembled
Warranty
1-year warranty
Terms and conditions apply. Learn more

title: Formwork Tray
description:
Working from their studio in London, American designer Kim Colin and British designer Sam Hecht have been honored with more than 50 international awards. Accolades, however, are not why they are in this business. Their Formwork Tray (2013) is one of the carefully considered desk accessories that make up the Formwork Collection. The shapes and sizes of the components were carefully considered so that each contributes to the utility of the whole. Made in China.
  • Part of a sleek system that brings rhythm and order to everyday tasks.
  • Nonslip silicone base.
  • Minimalist design that’s full of function.
Brand
Herman Miller
Collection
Formwork Collection
General Dimensions
  • 2" H 6⅜" W 5⅛" D
Assembly
Comes fully assembled
Warranty
1-year warranty
Terms and conditions apply. Learn more

title: Formwork Bin
description:
When Kim Colin and Sam Hecht designed products for Yamaha, Issey Miyake, Herman Miller, Muji, and many other companies, they approached each project as a means of simplifying people’s lives in an inspirational way. This bin is part of the Formwork Collection (2013), a modular system that brings order to the things that populate our desks. The shapes and sizes of the components were carefully considered so that each contributes to the utility of the whole. Made in China.
  • Part of a sleek system that brings rhythm and order to everyday tasks.
  • Can be used on its own or stacked in multiples.
  • Minimalist design that’s full of function.
Eco-Friendly Description: UL GREENGUARD® certified products are certified for low VOC emissions, which contribute to the creation of healthier indoor environments. Two tiers of certification are available: GREENGUARD Certification and GREENGUARD Gold Certification.
Brand
Herman Miller
Collection
Formwork Collection
General Dimensions
  • 7¾" H 9¾" W 13¼" D
Product Weight
1 lbs

Comes fully assembled
Warranty
1-year warranty

title: Trove Box
description:
Trove Desktop Storage (2017) brings rhythm and order to the items that populate our desks, from stationery to random odds and ends. This modular stacking system is fashioned from cork for a warm and tactile finish, with minimal components that seamlessly slot and stack together. Configure it as you see fit to help eliminate clutter in your workspace. Made in China.
Brand
Case
General Dimensions
  • 3⅝" H 4⅜" W 8¾" D
Product Weight
1 lbs

Comes fully assembled

1-year warranty

title: Uten Silo
description:
Uten Silo (1969) features containers in various shapes and sizes and metal hook-clips, making it perfect for organizing offices, kitchens, bathrooms, and more. It fell out of favor when plastics became too costly during the mid-1970s oil embargo and was reintroduced in 2002 to the delight of those seeking to minimize clutter in the home. Made in Germany.
Brand
Vitra
General Dimensions
  • 34¼" H 26½" W 2½" D
Product Weight
16 lbs
Assembly
Comes fully assembled
Warranty
5-year warranty
Terms and conditions apply. Learn more
